description: Gets a list of all scheduled queries in the caller's Amazon account and Region. ListScheduledQueries is eventually consistent.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: PreviousInvocationTime
nested_items.description: The last time the scheduled query was run.

nested_items.name: NextInvocationTime
nested_items.description: The next time the scheduled query is to be run.

nested_items.name: ErrorReportConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration for scheduled query error reporting.

nested_items.name: S3Configuration
nested_items.description: The S3 configuration for the error reports.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket under which error reports will be created.

nested_items.name: ObjectKeyPrefix
nested_items.description: Prefix for the error report key. Timestream by default adds the following prefix to the error report path.

nested_items.name: EncryptionOption
nested_items.description: Encryption at rest options for the error reports. If no encryption option is specified, Timestream will choose SSE_S3 as default.

nested_items.name: TargetDestination
nested_items.description: Target data source where final scheduled query result will be written.

nested_items.name: TimestreamDestination
nested_items.description: Query result destination details for Timestream data source.

nested_items.name: LastRunStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the last scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken from a previously truncated response.
